recipe.title: Power-Boosting Beets
ingredients: 2 red-skinned apples, such as Pippin, halved
instructions: Mix it up Cut two wafer-thin slices off one of the beet halves and reserve. Feed the beet and carrots, then the celery and cucumber, and finally the apples through a juicer. Stir in the walnuts. Fill a glass halfway with ice (if using), then pour in the juice. Thread the beet slices through a toothpick, lay it on top of the glass, and serve immediately.
